00402aba-c8cc-4fb8-8978-e691fcb7579a.name: Worldwide Pants
00402aba-c8cc-4fb8-8978-e691fcb7579a.description:
Named in honor of David Letterman, this big on flavor, malty Pale has minimal bitterness.

The Cascade and Falconer’s Flight Hops add light citrus notes & dry finish.

We hope it will make your Top 10 List!

011913d0-9c7e-49e6-9b3f-b6c22e0628ec.name: Sour Mama - Exbeeriment #1
011913d0-9c7e-49e6-9b3f-b6c22e0628ec.style: Sour Ale w/ Blueberries and Grapes
011913d0-9c7e-49e6-9b3f-b6c22e0628ec.description: Berlinerweiss style sour ale with local blueberries and grapes.  Fermented with our sourdough mother culture in a port wine barrel this beer is effervescent and full of fruit with a touch of funk.  Its tartness is middle of the road.

03811dc5-da50-4bbe-9afd-a1b72ccb34eb.name: Imperial Stout
03811dc5-da50-4bbe-9afd-a1b72ccb34eb.description: Pours jet-black with a tan head. Intense roasted malt character. Complex dark fruit flavors carry through bittersweet layers of coffee, chocolate, and rich toffee whilst the full-bodied, rich texture is balanced by big alcohol. Brewed with Pale malt, roasted barley, chocolate malt, flaked barley, black malt, Special B malt, peated malt, Munich malt, and white wheat.

04c4e7ab-722f-4e60-a447-4826f2c7b9fc.name: PRIME TIME PILSNER
04c4e7ab-722f-4e60-a447-4826f2c7b9fc.description: Our Classic American Pilsner is medium-bodied and golden in color with a moderate hop character featuring traditional noble hop varieties. A touch of sweetness in the finish imparted by flaked corn is complemented by a balanced bitterness. This lager is crisp, refreshing, and full of flavor. A true American original!

05d6caf1-a3dd-4215-8695-46e535dd6b3f.name: Barn Phantom Gose With Key Lime
05d6caf1-a3dd-4215-8695-46e535dd6b3f.description: Barn Phantom Gose with Key Lime –– Our Indiana Brewers Cup Gold Medal winning Gose has key lime with a touch of lemon peel, coriander and pink Himalayan rock salt.

06561f3e-bb72-4b93-8029-3f4ff9df03c5.name: Barn Phantom Gose with Mango
06561f3e-bb72-4b93-8029-3f4ff9df03c5.description:
When life gives you lemons throw them back and say, “I wanted a mango.” – Or have both!
This brew is refreshingly tart with a hint of sweet that will evoke images of sitting under a mango tree digging your toes into a sandy beach. Have your mango with a touch of lemon peel, coriander and pink Himalayan rock salt and enjoy a taste of the tropics any time you like. No beach required.

06602894-d34b-494f-9074-787035eddb8c.name: Barrel Aged Golden Sour
06602894-d34b-494f-9074-787035eddb8c.description:
A Golden Ale soured with lactobacillus acidophilus & aged in a bourbon barrel!
This beer is bright and sour on the palate with strong lemon & grapefruit notes

08dca252-430e-4a7a-a1c9-5d4dbb75ccc7.name: Nitro Rail Splitter IPA
08dca252-430e-4a7a-a1c9-5d4dbb75ccc7.description: Nitro version of our flagship beer, and a true example of the style, the Railsplitter India Pale Ale (IPA) is a fresh golden brew with noticeable citrus and floral aromas balanced on a nice malty backbone with a dry finish.

0aeac956-7413-48cb-8f1c-7a2e19960621.name: Gingerbread Porter
0aeac956-7413-48cb-8f1c-7a2e19960621.description:
A spiced Porter just in time for the holidays!

A unique brew from the mind of Brewer Jon, this sweet, spicy, earthy delicious beer is here to help you enjoy the family and hearth.

0d2582ef-da07-4dc0-a373-c5bd61c9165c.name: Milk The Musque - Gamma
0d2582ef-da07-4dc0-a373-c5bd61c9165c.description: This is our flagship farmhouse ale with Sauvignon Blanc Grape Must and Honey.  This is our unfiltered alpha offering, with great farmhouse character and big grapey berry aromatics.

0fdc30e0-5840-4b72-9472-1251444d3300.name: Stereotype
0fdc30e0-5840-4b72-9472-1251444d3300.description: Stereotype is a Belgian-style blonde ale made with pale malts and a traditional Belgian yeast strain. This yeast strain produces fruity esters that sometimes are described as bubblegum. It is light and refreshing. This version was dry hopped with Amarillo and add more hop character.

10058e29-8ec3-4587-9be4-6079c1a2fe25.name: STAR FRAME I.P.A.
10058e29-8ec3-4587-9be4-6079c1a2fe25.description: This I.P.A. drives off the tee with a subtle yet fulfilling body imparted by a heavy dose of malted wheat. It skips onto the green with assertive pineapple hop flavors supported by notes of mango and melon rind. Everyone taps in for birdie and we’ve got a Star Frame! Hive fives all around!

1084213b-6ad9-473f-bb18-faf0d22a73c6.name: LB Blonde
1084213b-6ad9-473f-bb18-faf0d22a73c6.description: Lite and Crisp.  This beer is perfectly balanced for a summer day.  Using Pilsner and Wheat malts fermented with Cal Ale to make a crisp clean profile and pleasant malt grain aroma.

11742175-68f1-4b07-b4a2-fff3d7d3e139.name: Gingerbread
11742175-68f1-4b07-b4a2-fff3d7d3e139.description: Our spiced brown ale just in time for the holidays! A unique brew from the mind of Brewer Jon, this sweet, spicy, earthy delicious beer is here to help you enjoy the family and hearth.

11fb1ac7-6eb3-4895-b80b-f5c6c70034a4.name: Kom-Brew-Cha
11fb1ac7-6eb3-4895-b80b-f5c6c70034a4.description: Probiotic and tart. This funk sparkling beverage is citrus meets barrel.

161757e2-4842-466d-8d51-a9e90309697e.name: Singel In Havana
161757e2-4842-466d-8d51-a9e90309697e.description: Fruit beers are best when they are done subtly. Blending fruit and beer require more the precision of a scalpel than the brute force of a chainsaw. The Guava in our Single in Havana adds just a touch of sweetness and tropical fruit to our crisp, dry Single in Bruges producing a well-balanced beer.

1a2eae29-8902-4c9d-a152-1211a9d67a54.name: Bro. Obscurite
1a2eae29-8902-4c9d-a152-1211a9d67a54.description: Imperial Stout aged in Bourbon and Port Barrels with Cacao and Grapes, fermented with our Golden Culture.

1acc0ed0-b7aa-4c29-a79e-b60a107f61c6.name: Wet Hopped Sly Boogie
1acc0ed0-b7aa-4c29-a79e-b60a107f61c6.description: Wet Hopped Sly Boogie Session IPA is wet-hopped with Centennial Hops grown here at Triton Brewing Company®! This delightful, hoppy IPA is a very small batch and (sadly) when it’s gone, it’s gone. The Wet Hopped Sly will only be available on draft. Sorry no growler fills.

1c7a08b6-339b-49f7-8d62-a2f8a28a3fe3.name: Sour Pale with UGLI Fruit
1c7a08b6-339b-49f7-8d62-a2f8a28a3fe3.description:
Part of our “Waitin’ On Wood Series.”

A Belgian Pale soured with lactobacillus acidophilus & infused with fresh UGLI fruit zest & pulp to provide an additional layer of flavor and sophistication.

1fefd634-3be4-47a6-8e31-61f8e1592c8b.name: Elite Project #1 Barleywine
1fefd634-3be4-47a6-8e31-61f8e1592c8b.description: Enjoy this unique, limited edition release from our Waitin’ On Wood Series. This American Barleywine spent a year in a Buffalo Trace Bourbon Barrel before being packaged exclusively for Elite Beverages, Indianapolis, Indiana. Prominent caramel, oak, bourbon and vanilla. Everything you expect from a bourbon barrel barleywine!

21b349a3-2135-4468-b421-bcee2327a6fd.name: Peanut Butter Milk Stout
21b349a3-2135-4468-b421-bcee2327a6fd.description: Formerly known as Nutty Professor Peanut Butter Milk Stout, this creamy, full-bodied milk stout is infused with the essence of peanut butter and chocolate and balanced by a hint of sweetness. No tricks, only treats!

21b5647b-b5ce-4c44-8731-88af0db5e56b.name: Mash Bandicoot
21b5647b-b5ce-4c44-8731-88af0db5e56b.description: Our annual Gen Con Beer in honor of Gen Con 50 and the 20th Anniversary of Crash Bandicoot video game franchise!

23b7a5ec-f0e4-4b01-94e6-4e517ec5d3c6.name: HatchPorter Pepper Ale
23b7a5ec-f0e4-4b01-94e6-4e517ec5d3c6.description: This American-style Porter is infused with cocoa nibs, Ghirardelli dark chocolate and habaneros for a unique flavor experience!

261fb855-0604-44ba-8b93-c2be6215389b.name: FADEAWAY I.P.A.
261fb855-0604-44ba-8b93-c2be6215389b.description: This West Coast I.P.A. is copper in color and medium-bodied with an aggressive hop bitterness, which is signature to this style. Malt flavors of caramel and light toast provide a sturdy backdrop for the hops to shine. German Ariana hops lend a resinous backbone while Bravo hops impart citrus notes reminiscent of orange and tangerine, which are complemented by the classic grapefruit character of Chinook hops.

269a661a-30d2-40f9-9028-391879495157.name: Barn Phantom Gose with Blueberries
269a661a-30d2-40f9-9028-391879495157.description: You know what’s awesome? A blueberry patch; also, your face! Effervescent and lightly sour, with blueberry and citrus aromas and a hint of minerality this brew is Triton Brewing’s interpretation of the classic German style, updated with a modern twist! This session-able unfiltered blueberry wheat beer will surely make you dream of blueberry fields forever.

2ad2f8db-20fb-460c-8908-f8748a0e3633.name: Magnificent Amber
2ad2f8db-20fb-460c-8908-f8748a0e3633.description: A particularly well-balanced medium-bodied example, the Magnificent Amber Ale pours amber to copper with a slightly off-white head, leads with a hoppy nose, follows with a toasty maltiness, and wraps gracefully with a noticeably caramel finish.

304d78c7-9289-4427-8658-4fbb4d01ae88.name: Milk The Cranberry
304d78c7-9289-4427-8658-4fbb4d01ae88.description: Our flagship farmhouse with cranberries added.

34cd4ea5-d460-471e-88c0-4863371963b4.name: LB 4 LB 3.0
34cd4ea5-d460-471e-88c0-4863371963b4.description: New England Style DIPA with Simcoe, Mouteka and Mosiac.  Fermented with Sacc Trios and London Ale III.  Final dry hop with cryo-lupulin Powder (mosaic and simcoe).

3569017b-fcce-4948-9651-e989b022aef7.name: I-R-M-A IPA
3569017b-fcce-4948-9651-e989b022aef7.description: IRMA is a beer brewed for hurricane relief. In the aftermath of hurricane IRMA, several South Florida Breweries teamed up to brew this beer at MIA Brewing, with ingredients donated by suppliers. This is an IPA brewed with hops that spell IRMA: Idaho, Rakau, Mosaic, and Amarillo. As Barrel of Monks participated in this brew, we are glad to provide you with a rare chance to drink an IPA in our tasting room. Profits from the sale of this beer will go to Feeding Florida (www.feedingflorida.org).

3571ae12-6464-4d86-8be1-8388887874c8.name: Peanut Butter Milk Stout on Nitro
3571ae12-6464-4d86-8be1-8388887874c8.description: Formerly known as Nutty Professor Peanut Butter Milk Stout, this creamy, full-bodied milk stout is infused with the essence of peanut butter and chocolate and balanced by a hint of sweetness. No tricks, only treats! Made extra creamy and vibrant by serving it on one of our nitro taps!

361b1448-df97-4c2c-91b4-19a715abc3fc.name: Fieldhouse
361b1448-df97-4c2c-91b4-19a715abc3fc.description: Fieldhouse Wheat® – With a Bronze Medal at the 2017 Great American Beer Fest®, this American Wheat Ale is the way it’s supposed to be! Crisp & refreshing, gold in color with a white head, this Wheat is moderately hopped for a thoroughly friendly experience.		        5.4% ABV | 25 IBU’s

371a74ae-67c5-4735-bf55-383e05af6122.name: Batch 1090
371a74ae-67c5-4735-bf55-383e05af6122.description:
Experimental IPA with Southern Cross Hops

Just in time for the holidays we are unveiling our latest experiment, this 6.0% ABV and 60 IBU India Pale made with Southern Cross Hops from New Zealand. This IPA will be available on draft for pints and growler fills, until “The Experiment,” is complete!

3a8238b8-e00a-46c4-abbb-f0b0427abe91.name: HEADYBRAH OKTOBERFEST
3a8238b8-e00a-46c4-abbb-f0b0427abe91.description: This traditional German Lager is brewed for Oktoberfest, the annual celebration of autumn. Malt flavors of light caramel and toasted bread are balanced by the delicate grassy aromas of European hops. Several months of cold storage (i.e. lagering) creates a clean, crisp and approachable beer. Headybrah is released on the same date as the start of the Oktoberfest Festival in Munich, which actually starts during the end of September.

3b0880f9-c75e-44b0-9290-a7b964714361.name: Actually Chocolatey
3b0880f9-c75e-44b0-9290-a7b964714361.description: Basically, this is our chocolatey stout with actual cocoa nibs added and a touch of Coffee from Black Ring Roasters.

4123daeb-35dc-4592-bcc9-44eb3c005e82.name: Golden Sour
4123daeb-35dc-4592-bcc9-44eb3c005e82.description: Golden Sour with our house culture.

44f4155c-30f8-43b7-87f4-0c39de2ac67e.name: Barrier Hop Ale
44f4155c-30f8-43b7-87f4-0c39de2ac67e.description:
Our Sly Boogie has been infused with grapefruit in honor of the Shamrock Cycles Racing Team pre-season kick-off party and our third year of sponsoring the team!

You’re invited to come try it!Barrier Hop Ale will be available in pints and growlers, while it lasts!

4b8027c0-97d4-4324-905f-abae609076d6.name: MEADOWS! BELGIAN PALE
4b8027c0-97d4-4324-905f-abae609076d6.description: Wind in your hair Sun in your face Witness the beauty of this specific place Smell the prairie air Feel its power Glowing glass of liquid grain and flowers Friends, gather round Let's hug it out With a unified voice, give a soulful shout MEADOWS!

4f6a90da-a5bb-45c1-ac6d-f75aa1075bb6.name: Sour Pale with Strawberriees
4f6a90da-a5bb-45c1-ac6d-f75aa1075bb6.description: Part of our Barn Phantom (Sour) Series and part of our Waiting On Wood (Barrel-aged) Series. This Belgian-style Pale Ale that has been appropriately soured with lactobacillus acidophilus providing green apple, tart cherry, grapefruit and even apricot notes. Then the ale is infused with fresh strawberries to provide another layer of sophistication to the flavor profile!

51d0c02f-cf41-4b59-bd97-baf5eb699fe3.name: Experiment 1557
51d0c02f-cf41-4b59-bd97-baf5eb699fe3.description: This experimental, traditional American Pale Ale is clean and crisp, and brewed with Citra, Cascade, Columbus, Galena and Magnum hops. This wonderful Pale provides the bright citrus notes and great flavor and at 4.7% ABV you can have more than one!

5423d1fd-c143-4cf4-9873-9864b6fe5397.name: Sour Pale with Tart Cherries
5423d1fd-c143-4cf4-9873-9864b6fe5397.description:
Barn Phantom (Sour) is part of our Waiting On Wood Series. It is a Belgian-style Pale Ale that has been appropriately soured with lactobacillus acidophilus providing green apple, tart cherry, grapefruit and even apricot notes.
Then the Barn Phantom is infused with fresh cherries to provide another layer of sophistication to the flavor profile.

57bb4db6-6d98-4439-a34e-53b56681bf84.name: Shot to the Tart
57bb4db6-6d98-4439-a34e-53b56681bf84.description: This non-traditional Belgian-style Specialty Strong Ale was developed as a high gravity beer for our “Watin’ On Wood Series.” Tart and sweet with distinct cherry notes. Fermented with 100% Montmorency Cherry Puree, this brew is something spectacular! As our #TritonArmy says #TartMeUp

5833be73-3b75-491b-9d8c-d82016ccf888.name: Hometown Hero
5833be73-3b75-491b-9d8c-d82016ccf888.description: Hometown Hero Ale® – a session-able American-style Golden Ale named as a tribute to our local hometown heroes. A portion of the proceeds from sales of this brew are given to local charities benefiting local heroes including: veterans, police, fire & EMT’s.			          4.5% ABV | 16 IBU’s

5a98c651-e619-4274-b6e7-ab263a77f216.name: Sour Pale with Valencia Orange
5a98c651-e619-4274-b6e7-ab263a77f216.description: From our Barn Phantom Series: A Belgian Pale soured with lactobacillus acidophilus, aged in a Heaven Hill Distillery Baerrel & infused with fresh Valencia Orange zest & pulp.

5b987cd7-fad9-4f7e-b873-6452f4e73ef3.name: Grand Cru
5b987cd7-fad9-4f7e-b873-6452f4e73ef3.description: This is a special release ale brewed annually for our anniversary in March. It varies from year to year but is always a special small batch release that promises to please.

607ac9a9-bdb3-4c1b-9224-aef4e8def47e.name: Experiment 1557 (Pale Ale)
607ac9a9-bdb3-4c1b-9224-aef4e8def47e.description: Experiment 1557 (Pale Ale) – Traditional American Pale Ale, clean and crisp. Brewed with Citra, Cascade, Columbus, Galena and Magnum hops, providing bright citrus notes and great flavor!	             4.7% ABV l 35 IBU’s

60aedcc7-ca04-45ab-adb0-840e8c84c98d.name: Bourbon Barrel Oud Bruin (2015)
60aedcc7-ca04-45ab-adb0-840e8c84c98d.description: This Brown Ale went into a bourbon barrel in 2015. Soured with Lactobacillus acidophilus, this beer has significant tart cherry notes with a beautiful chocolate malt “backbone” and nice malty sweetness.

66d3d8ce-8130-45d3-b55d-0e5e1ee5ee10.name: BLACK ARIA BALTIC PORTER
66d3d8ce-8130-45d3-b55d-0e5e1ee5ee10.description: This classic beer style originates from the area surrounding the Baltic Sea and blends elements of English Porter with Russian Imperial Stout, but is fermented with lager yeast instead of ale yeast. Rich malt flavors of dark raisin and caramel meld with a righteous roastiness that has a pleasant lingering aftertaste.

6bae4afb-8c69-4d04-88ad-0ae58d239662.name: Atlantik-Ale
6bae4afb-8c69-4d04-88ad-0ae58d239662.description: Der englische Bierstil „Ale“ bezeichnete ursprünglich ein ungehopftes Bier. Zu Zeiten der Hanse wurde der Hopfen in England eingeführt und es entstanden die heute bekannten englischen Ales, die vor allem für Ihre starke Hopfung und lange Haltbarkeit berühmt sind. Das begehrte Ale-Rezept verbreitete sich in den Hansestädten und stellt damit auch die Basis für unser Atlantik-Ale, ein naturbelassenes, obergäriges, helles Ale mit einer Stammwürze von 11,4%.

6bc4798a-743f-4d8a-b15e-24bd3b114f0e.name: Mahogger Lager
6bc4798a-743f-4d8a-b15e-24bd3b114f0e.description: Named after our neighborhood groundhog, “Mahogger,” this is Triton Brewing Company’s first foray into the Lager-land. Brewed exclusively with Saaz Hops and traditional malts help make this Pilsner unique and tasty and is a fitting tribute to the biggest rodent we know.

6c7e42cd-46ec-4b85-8661-21365d975fe0.name: Quadraphonic
6c7e42cd-46ec-4b85-8661-21365d975fe0.description: Inspired by the Trappist brewers in Belgium, the Quardupel is a Belgian style ale that is typically dark, strong, and bold in flavor. Our Quadraphonic is no exception. Quadraphonic is deep brown in color with reddish hues. It bursts with flavors of dark fruits, chocolate, and raisins, with a long rich finish. This beer is designed for celebration and decadence, and hides it's 10.5% ABV well.

6d2fa643-da9a-4693-a483-7c92765a3726.name: Grand Citra Station
6d2fa643-da9a-4693-a483-7c92765a3726.description: Our “cult classic IPA,” Soul Crusher, returns with its new name Grand Citra Station®! This American IPA will be available in pints and growlers. Brewed for GenCon 2014, this beer was one of our most sought after seasonal brews.

78258f49-a1d6-40e2-987e-578d2b771b4c.name: My belgian blonde got Ten Miled
78258f49-a1d6-40e2-987e-578d2b771b4c.description: Blond Belgian with pepper and bubblegum with hints of funk. Yeast cultured from old wine with Brett.

79a6c012-7dca-4bc9-bad5-78708cb5e563.name: Convoluted And Hazy
79a6c012-7dca-4bc9-bad5-78708cb5e563.description:
Convoluted And Hazy IPA (‘känvə loodəd ‘hāzē)

This ‘känvə loodəd ‘hāzē IPA was inspired by the great, hazy and juicy IPA’s made in New England. We didn’t lose our way on this interpretation of the style, as ours features Mosaic and Citra Hops and is our own!

We aren’t inspired by their football, but their IPA’s aren’t half bad!

84b0e40a-cb84-4f84-9189-50e0de8b66c8.name: Experiment 1185
84b0e40a-cb84-4f84-9189-50e0de8b66c8.description: We will be tapping a new and unique, specialty experimental Pale Ale brewed with Chinook, Cascade, CTZ and Cluster Hops. The Four C’s of Pale!

85a80d00-bd26-4b79-9385-8d6bcad42cfc.name: Barn Phantom Gose
85a80d00-bd26-4b79-9385-8d6bcad42cfc.description: Barn Phantom Gose – 2016 IBC Gold Medal Winning Sour Ale! Effervescent and delicately sour, with a citrus aroma & hint of minerality, this Gose is brewed with coriander, lemon zest & pink Himalayan salt, this ale sparkles with jubilant personality!      4.0% ABV | 10 IBU’s

8844fb8b-fb02-41ed-b235-c0cccc27c7ce.name: Segway to Munich
8844fb8b-fb02-41ed-b235-c0cccc27c7ce.description: A clean, malt-forward German lager with a smooth, dry finish. The subtle use of the popular Bavarian hop variety, Haullertau, the flavor is well balanced between malt and light sweetness. This is a crisp and refreshing, everyday beer.

8c60ecfa-9344-427a-a09f-6f96922a5322.name: Three Fates
8c60ecfa-9344-427a-a09f-6f96922a5322.description: The Three Fates in Greek mythology were sisters who determined length of life and eventual demise, they held the key to your destiny. Three Fates Tripel is a 9% ale with subtle hints of caramel, sweet bread and plenty of zesty spice from the Belgian yeast strain. It is often described as quite pleasant in appearance with a deep golden color and a white frothy head.

8cd739e3-71e6-41ef-9a4f-f6674fd0ae1f.name: Bee Coffee Rail Splitter IPA
8cd739e3-71e6-41ef-9a4f-f6674fd0ae1f.description:
Our flagship beer, Rail Splitter India Pale Ale infused with coffee barrel-aged in a Four Finger Rye Whiskey barrel from local Bee Coffee Roasters.

This brew’s malty, floral and citrus notes play delicately with the coffee’s notes of amaretto, vanilla and spice.Our first foray into coffee IPA’s and we did it with our old friends from Bee Coffee Roasters! This wonderful barrel-aged coffee comes from the Bee Barrel Program.

8d62e195-6770-4545-a434-280b42fb40fa.name: Sour Pale with Grapefruit
8d62e195-6770-4545-a434-280b42fb40fa.description: Barn Phantom (Sour) with Grapefruit – Part of our “Waitin’ On Wood Series.” A Belgian Pale soured with lactobacillus acidophilus & infused with fresh grapefruit zest and pulp to provide an additional layer of sophistication.

8d6ffec6-3897-47ae-87d4-2f552a2cb292.name: Bryce you are fucking this up!

8fdd4c3c-0c25-4d08-983c-83965e154119.name: Chocolatey
8fdd4c3c-0c25-4d08-983c-83965e154119.description: Chocolatey, rich, smooth dry stout is perfectly balanced for your glass.

908ad0dd-f512-4365-b621-c07748a6e1f1.name: Toccata
908ad0dd-f512-4365-b621-c07748a6e1f1.description: Toccata is our Belgian-style Amber Ale. Amber in color (doh!), it is easy drinking at 5% ABV, with a light toasted biscuity malt backbone that finishes with a gentle hop finish. Pairs well with light dishes and hot Florida days.

90cb0338-346f-49dd-8200-740a154ee3d3.name: Ale Pacino (Mocaccino)
90cb0338-346f-49dd-8200-740a154ee3d3.description: “Say, ‘Hello,’ to our little friend,” a seasonal collaboration with Bee Coffee Roasters – Ale Pacino Mocaccino, a coffee and organic chocolate infused lactose-Brown Ale! To paraphrase this ale’s namesake, “Something would be missing without the coffee.”  Whoo-ah! Whoo-ah!

97a386af-5182-497f-9bde-4d8b89fd0c38.name: Witty in Pink
97a386af-5182-497f-9bde-4d8b89fd0c38.description: Witty in Pink is our raspberry enhanced Belgian-style Wit. It is tangy and refreshing. And yes it is Pink! This beer is brewed once a year for charity, 50% of our profits go to breast cancer awareness, research, and treatment.

9a04c1c8-8642-45d5-b495-864af206814d.name: Hometown Hero with Coffee
9a04c1c8-8642-45d5-b495-864af206814d.description:
Brewed for Indy Girls Pint Out (Indy GPO) 2nd Annual Coffee Beer & Donuts on October 1, 2016 at City Market. The brew is our Hometown Hero Golden Ale infused with Bee Coffee Roasters beans roasted particularly for this brew.

Hometown Hero is a session-able American-style Golden Ale named as a tribute to our local hometown heroes. This beer has a pale gold body that is clean and refreshing; sure to be a palate pleaser in any crowd. A portion of the proceeds from sales of this brew are given to local charities benefitting local heroes including: veterans, police, fire, and emergency services.

Benefits the Following: The Pat McAfee Foundation Indianapolis F.O.P. #86 Vietnam Veterans of America, Chapter 295 Lawrence Firefighters Local 416 United States Army Ranger Association American Society of Military Comptrollers The Eskenzai Health Foundation Domestic Violence Network

9a08e009-fb91-43f2-9347-64fa73e72a80.name: Bourbon Barrel Three Tine Tripel (2017)
9a08e009-fb91-43f2-9347-64fa73e72a80.description: Bourbon Barrel Three Tine Tripel (2017) - part of our Waiting On Wood Series, this Tripel was aged for seven months in a fresh Knob Creek® Select Bourbon Barrel. 	    	    13-15% ABV l 23 IBU’s

9b340ca8-bcc5-46f2-8db1-c2e76e934c54.name: COLORADO KIND
9b340ca8-bcc5-46f2-8db1-c2e76e934c54.description: This American Extra Special Bitter boasts a unique combination of toasty caramel malt with classic Cascade hop flavor and aroma. This brand is considered a “varietal” because it only uses one hop variety. Non-hoppy beer drinkers may discover Colorado Kind to be a surprisingly approachable hoppy beer. Just ask for a pint of “the dank”!

9c08eadb-7854-46a3-b1cc-104eda313bbc.name: Batch One
9c08eadb-7854-46a3-b1cc-104eda313bbc.description: Batch #1 (Bourbon Barrel Oatmeal Stout) (2016) – Brewed August 2011 in honor of our opening and then aged for 61 months in a 7-year-old Heaven Hill Bourbon Barrel!

9e3fa92a-e8ae-4f73-ae58-e4a776cf6fd5.name: Nutty Professor Peanut Butter Nitro Milk Stout
9e3fa92a-e8ae-4f73-ae58-e4a776cf6fd5.description: In honor of Halloween, we made a special peanut butter milk stout, on nitro for a special creamy experience! Warning this beer does contain nuts & lactose sugar!

9f55fdf1-4595-4efa-9545-0ed974745c9e.name: Sly Boogie
9f55fdf1-4595-4efa-9545-0ed974745c9e.description: Sly Boogie Session IPA – Crisp and citrusy with a balanced, hoppy finish that will make your palate boogie down! Everything that you love about an IPA & you can have more than one! It’s sly and that’s no boogie!			        5.0% ABV l 50 IBU’s

a0d1310d-b3fe-43ed-8488-d0c087132f59.name: Barn Owl Strawberry Tart
a0d1310d-b3fe-43ed-8488-d0c087132f59.description:
This kettle sour is named after the Barn Owl (Tyto alba), an Indiana State-endangered species and brewed in honor of our event April 29, 2017, 4-8pm, with Indiana Department of Natural Resources (DNR) to support their efforts to save endangered species in Indiana. Soured in the kettle, this tart ale has been infused with strawberry and Pink Himalayan Salt to provide an additional layer of sophistication and delicious fruit flavor!

Triton Brewing will donate 10% of the sales for the 29th to help support saving this wonderful bird and other threatened species in Indiana.

a41d9416-f721-4c54-baa6-68652c1913a4.name: Nuance
a41d9416-f721-4c54-baa6-68652c1913a4.description: Saison is a funny category of beer. They can take the form of super funky farmhouse ales, full of earthy or even horsey aromas and flavors (horsey tastes better than it sounds, rest assured!). On the other end of the spectrum, you have the clean refined flavors or zesty spice and light, tart citrus. Our Nuance is very much in latter category, dry and effervescent with subtle spice notes that blend seamlessly with light floral hops. Neither big nor bold, it is a little more…nuanced.

a4e685eb-ce3f-4b84-98db-13cb77a76130.name: Sour Pale with Cranberries
a4e685eb-ce3f-4b84-98db-13cb77a76130.description: Barn Phantom Series is part of our Waiting On Wood Series. It is a Belgian-style Pale Ale that has been appropriately soured with lactobacillus acidophilus providing green apple, tart cherry, grapefruit and even apricot notes. Then the Barn Phantom is infused with fresh cranberries to provide another layer of sophistication to the flavor profile.

a6b1ec20-4bee-495e-b841-0aec0d3982f8.name: Roggen-Weizen
a6b1ec20-4bee-495e-b841-0aec0d3982f8.description:
Störtebeker Roggen-Weizen is a robust dark wheat beer, known for its creamy body and a blend of vanilla and fruit aromas that tantalize the palate. It's unfiltered, top-fermented and made from rye and wheat, which contributes to its rich, chestnut brown color and full-bodied taste. The combination of rye, wheat, roasted, and caramel malts provide a deep hue and a velvety texture, while a light hopping with the Emerald variety allows the vanilla and red fruit aromas to fully unfold​​​​.

This beer has been recognized for its excellence, notably being awarded as the best dark wheat beer in 2014. It's described as having a flavor profile that includes banana, clove, caramel, and spicy yeast, all contributing to a complex and satisfying taste experience​​​​. Served at a temperature of around 16°C to best enjoy its flavors.

abc7c9f0-2c56-49e6-aaa0-6a69934d350e.name: Sin Bin
abc7c9f0-2c56-49e6-aaa0-6a69934d350e.description: Sin Bin Belgian Pale Ale – Our official salute to hockey! This clean, malty Belgian-style Pale Ale won’t send you to the penalty box. 	  6.2% ABV|19 IBU’s

ae1df7b2-cd7f-4ab9-a507-84b7c9156178.name: Barn Phantom Gose with Strawberry
ae1df7b2-cd7f-4ab9-a507-84b7c9156178.description: Barn Phantom Gose with Strawberry - Barn Phantom Series – Our Indiana Brewers Cup Gold Medal winning Gose has strawberry with a touch of lemon peel, coriander and pink Himalayan salt. Fruity & refreshing!		4.0% ABV l 10 IBU’s

b38e3b76-43a0-491e-96fa-1523d6aaab1e.name: Barn Phantom Saison with Blood Orange
b38e3b76-43a0-491e-96fa-1523d6aaab1e.description:
Brewed in 2015 and barrel-aged in, this Saison was brewed with white and pink Peppercorns and Coriander.
After brewing, this ale was inoculated with lactobacillus acidophilus and aged in a barrel with blood orange. Citrusy and moderately sour, this Saison is sure to haunt and tickle your palate! Refreshing.

b45d40cc-97d7-457e-b575-a706c90b15dc.name: Rail Splitter IPA
b45d40cc-97d7-457e-b575-a706c90b15dc.description: Rail Splitter India Pale Ale (IPA) ® – Our flagship beer, and a true example of the style, this IPA is a fresh golden brew with noticeable citrus and floral aromas balanced on a nice malty backbone with a dry finish.     		        7.0% ABV | 70 IBU’s

b52fb41a-a968-41e5-97d8-597c77cd27c1.name: Single in the Sun
b52fb41a-a968-41e5-97d8-597c77cd27c1.description: While Belgian monks have brought us boldly flavored and high octane beers such as Tripels and Quadrupels, the beer that they are most likely drinking themselves is a Singel or Patersbeir. Like those monks, at Barrel of Monks you’ll likely see us enjoying this clean and refreshing beer regularly as there is always something to be done and staying on as even a keel as possible is key. It’s both the perfect beer to begin your quest into the world of Belgian Ales and an ideal choice after a long day of toil and trouble.

b615bb93-f805-4eed-a6c4-24ab4d9f53f8.name: Hatchblower Pepper IPA
b615bb93-f805-4eed-a6c4-24ab4d9f53f8.description: This fresh and fruity IPA derives its name from the nickname of of astronaut Gus Grissom, who earned his wings at our home, Fort Ben. Piquant and delicious, this beer is flavored with green pepper, chipotles & jalapeños during the conditioning process. With subtle spice and sweetness, it is a delight for the taste buds!

b64218a9-80ec-436c-880f-e5fb30c927b2.name: Endless Enigma
b64218a9-80ec-436c-880f-e5fb30c927b2.description: In a world full of over bitter IPAs, our Endless Enigma is the perfect blend, plenty of hop flavor and aroma without the mouth-numbing bitterness that many pale ales offer. Old world hops lend grassy, herbaceous notes to the flavors of caramel malt and banana. Now let us be clear, there is absolutely nothing wrong with a big, bold and bitter beer, but we simply lean towards offering a bit more malt balance and yeast character in our Belgian Pale Ale.

b64ca5b0-0d47-4db5-9b20-5ab513c432ab.name: LB 4 LB
b64ca5b0-0d47-4db5-9b20-5ab513c432ab.description: Hazy Pale Ale chock-full of cascade for bittering and Motueka, Kohatu and Citra for flavor and aroma.

b7163186-20eb-4e06-866e-5056a246f315.name: Rustic Wit
b7163186-20eb-4e06-866e-5056a246f315.description: Classic Belgian Wit Bier with a touch of farmhouse makes this doughy rustic beverage a summer treat.

b7810ffa-985c-43f6-bbb2-8db46e8578e0.name: Single in Bruges
b7810ffa-985c-43f6-bbb2-8db46e8578e0.description: While Trappist monks have brought us boldly flavored and highly octaned beers such as Tripels and Quadruples, the beer that they are most likely drinking themselves is a Singel or Patersbier. Like those monks, at Barrel of Monks you’ll likely see us enjoying this clean and refreshing beer regularly as there is always something to be done and staying on even keel is key. It’s both the perfect beer to begin your quest into the world of Belgian Ales and an ideal choice after a long day of toil and trouble.

b9327417-9696-45ca-ad54-91280075b52b.name: Rainbow Bright Strawberry Golden Ale
b9327417-9696-45ca-ad54-91280075b52b.description:
Brewed for Indy Pride 2017, we have taken a delightful, clean, crisp Golden Ale and infused it with strawberries.
This ale provides a refreshing, fruity and fabulous taste experience!

b9d7baa4-ffdd-4599-b9d1-a9e675ae0b0a.name: Sour Pale 5 Alive
b9d7baa4-ffdd-4599-b9d1-a9e675ae0b0a.description: Part of our Waitin’ On Wood Series, this Belgian-style Pale Ale has been soured with lactobacillus acidophilus, aged 11+ (eleven) months in a Heaven Hill Barrel over lemon, lime, grapefruit, orange and tangerine fruit purees, and then conditioned with the all 5 (five) fruit zests!

ba043257-8098-49bd-a0c2-34b0fc0a8d91.name: LB 4 LB 2.0
ba043257-8098-49bd-a0c2-34b0fc0a8d91.description: Unfiltered IPA with great hop aroma and flavor. Bitterness is present but not overpowering with a healthy dose of Citra, Mosiac and Idaho 7. This IPA packs a punch of pine resin with a backend note of citrus. This delight operates at 7.4% abv to round out the whole picture. Enjoy!

bbc2b6b2-0096-493e-81c6-4571aa27270e.name: XXX PALE
bbc2b6b2-0096-493e-81c6-4571aa27270e.description: XXX is a Mountain Sun classic! A stronger, more intense version of a classic American Pale Ale, our Strong American Pale Ale boasts a prominent hop bitterness, but is balanced by a pleasant malt sweetness and a citrusy, piney hop aroma provided by American hops.

bec76be0-1b03-423a-9ff9-1c5d92642b41.name: Milk The Mustache
bec76be0-1b03-423a-9ff9-1c5d92642b41.description: Our flagship tart farmhouse.  100% oak barrel (wine) fermented with our mixed farmhouse culture.  Bright citrus and stone fruit notes with signature rustic farmhouse base.  Crisp and delicious.

c2637a80-8e80-4078-8023-5f2b8bb4bf5d.name: Barrel Aged Three Tine Tripel (2015)
c2637a80-8e80-4078-8023-5f2b8bb4bf5d.description: Part of our “Waitin’ On Wood Series,” this ‘Behemoth’ of a beer provides an exceptionally complex flavor profile, fruity with a sweet, dry finish. Brewed December 2014, and then aged in a Basil Hayden’s Bourbon Barrel!

c57f997e-8845-406d-844e-d73a39c4fd34.name: Wet Hopped Harvest Rail IPA
c57f997e-8845-406d-844e-d73a39c4fd34.description: Our Railsplitter IPA hopped with dry-hopped with fresh Centennial hops grown in the Beer Garden at the Brewery.

c672681b-7909-48a1-b97f-0a626257d238.name: Three Tine Tripel (2016)
c672681b-7909-48a1-b97f-0a626257d238.description: Big and boozy, this Belgian-style ale provides an exceptionally complex flavor profile, fruity with a sweet, dry finish. This high-gravity offering is always a favorite until it’s gone.

c6c9d69a-87b5-48d8-96aa-c0833c57def5.name: LB Pale
c6c9d69a-87b5-48d8-96aa-c0833c57def5.description: Clean and Crisp Pale ale with Motueka, Kohatu, and Citra hops. Classic Cascade Bittering.

c91cc6da-ecfd-4188-9a3b-cc39a01f60b5.name: Grapefruit Rail Splitter IPA
c91cc6da-ecfd-4188-9a3b-cc39a01f60b5.description:
This is one of our favorite beers, the Rail Splitter IPA infused with grapefruit. A perfect combination to satisfy those hop heads and citrus lovers alike!
It is available on draft and in 16oz cans!

c9bc396b-ce9e-4398-abdd-3f96b874559e.name: Dr Gingey Beards Fixer Elixir
c9bc396b-ce9e-4398-abdd-3f96b874559e.description: Ginger beer blended with a pleasantly hopped Belgian farmhouse ale.

cae1a7ed-5175-46d7-a915-e6677327af5e.name: Parade of Souls
cae1a7ed-5175-46d7-a915-e6677327af5e.description: This is our annual Imperial Stout. Black malts lend a subtle roastiness and velvety notes of chocolate, while our estery yeast strain combines with pitch black candi sugar to add dark fruit notes to the celebration.

cc2e8b2e-2249-4341-8a04-db22262be5be.name: Nitro Gingerbread Porter
cc2e8b2e-2249-4341-8a04-db22262be5be.description:
A spiced Porter just in time for the holidays!

This version is served on one of out nitro taps for an extra creamy experience!

A unique brew from the mind of Brewer Jon, this sweet, spicy, earthy delicious beer is here to help you enjoy the family and hearth.

cd4b2c6e-4ff9-4859-b8ad-d3ea13d362e6.name: Larry's OG Lager
cd4b2c6e-4ff9-4859-b8ad-d3ea13d362e6.style: Lite Dry Hopped - Dry Terped Lager
cd4b2c6e-4ff9-4859-b8ad-d3ea13d362e6.description: Lite Lager with Piney Herbal Dry Hopping and an extra something special.

d120c1bf-2dfe-450f-b0df-81f409b8c350.name: Sour Pale with Rhubarb
d120c1bf-2dfe-450f-b0df-81f409b8c350.description:
The Sour Pale with Rhubarb is part of our Waiting On Wood Series.

It is a Belgian-style Pale Ale that has been appropriately soured with lactobacillus acidophilus providing green apple, tart cherry, grapefruit and even apricot notes.

We then infused this Pale with the crimson stocks of fresh rhubarb for exquisite tartness!

d57c9204-be70-4478-882d-94af557b33a6.name: LUCIE
d57c9204-be70-4478-882d-94af557b33a6.description:
Voor de liefhebbers van Tripels en Sterk Blond, een krachtig pittig sprankelijke bier.

Gebrouwen volgens een uniek brouwprocede, waarbij we verschillende soorten thee (!) via een uniek infusieproces blenden in het bier.

Een unieke interpretatie van de krachtige ‘Sterk Blond’ bieren.

Maar let op, dit blondje van 8% kan pittig uit de hoek komen !

d5a5a6ef-4bc6-4744-b5f4-eac89ad94636.name: STOKED OAK STOUT
d5a5a6ef-4bc6-4744-b5f4-eac89ad94636.description: Former Mountain Sun brewer Scott Overdorf, who now owns Hobart Brewing in Tasmania, masterfully balanced various malts, vanilla and oak to create an “Old World-Style” stout with barrel-aged character. The combination of smoked malt and the additions of pure vanilla extract and toasted oak spirals give the impression of a barrel-aged stout without having undergone the barrel-aging process.

d9e7bb55-c8de-467a-9d83-174a65890570.name: Barn Phantom Gose With Raspberry
d9e7bb55-c8de-467a-9d83-174a65890570.description: Our 2016 Indiana Brewers Cup Gold Medal winning Gose recipe infused with raspberry, a touch of lemon peel, coriander and pink Himalayan rock salt. Fruity and refreshing!

da1dda4e-553d-4404-b42d-7c4dc211cd3e.name: Deadeye Stout on Nitro
da1dda4e-553d-4404-b42d-7c4dc211cd3e.description: Dark and opaque, with a big roasty malty nose, a slight hint of coffee and notes of sweet toffee, all swaddled in oaty creaminess, this beer delivers the full-bodied mouth-feel you expect from a stout.

db1a6f43-adb4-4526-9717-cb4be0747a1a.name: Bourbon Barrel Double Deadeye (2014)
db1a6f43-adb4-4526-9717-cb4be0747a1a.description:
This is our Double Deadeye Imperial Stout (2014) –brewed in 2014.

We put it in a a new Heaven Hill Bourbon Barrel for almost three years.

Here is the result. We think you agree. WOW!

db28fa7c-a1e5-4001-b8db-b4d48404442b.name: Experiment 1185
db28fa7c-a1e5-4001-b8db-b4d48404442b.description:
We coffee-infused our easy-drinking specialty Pale infused with Papua New Guinea-Waghi Valley coffee beans roasted just blocks away from the Brewery by Porter’s Books and Breads. The Chinook, Cluster, Cascade, and CTZ hops provide a nice, fresh balance to the robust coffee nose. We will have very limited quantities of this beer, be sure to try it in the tasting room before it’s gone!

Brewed for GPO’s 3rd Annual Coffee Beer and Donuts, Experiment 1185 Pale Ale with Coffee will be available on draft until it’s gone.

dde302ea-9b0e-4373-9c5a-eaa57daf7cc3.name: Milk The Peach
dde302ea-9b0e-4373-9c5a-eaa57daf7cc3.description: Our flagship farmhouse ale with July Flame peaches from Tenerelli Farms via Long Beach Farms.

e122efd6-ad58-40c7-9500-2b50027e41f6.name: Abbey Terno
e122efd6-ad58-40c7-9500-2b50027e41f6.description: Charmingly tweaked from the Latin term Ab Aeterno which translates to “from eternity” or “since the beginning” depending on who you ask, Abbey Terno is our version of the abbey style Dubbel. This timeless brown beer makes liberal use of delicious Belgian candi sugar that adds notes of toffee, dried fruit, just a hint of chocolate and is dry and sessionable even at 7.5% ABV.

e23f282c-dc23-4308-9b2c-8bc1b04bd6e5.name: Milk The Blueberry
e23f282c-dc23-4308-9b2c-8bc1b04bd6e5.description: Our flagship farmhouse ale with Blueberries.

e5c63c9a-364a-4bf2-87fd-527f0709b6bd.name: 500 Monks Belgian Strong Ale
e5c63c9a-364a-4bf2-87fd-527f0709b6bd.description:
Sweet, strong and amazing 500 Monks will help you gain enlightenment!

A traditional Belgian Dark Strong Ale!

e6453acc-af94-46f4-85f5-813cc3566905.name: The Wizard
e6453acc-af94-46f4-85f5-813cc3566905.description: The Wit, Witbier or White Ale is a staple among Belgian brewers and is an ideal style for those seeking a drinkable yet full flavored beer. The large quantities of wheat lend a slight bready tang that compliments the orange peel and coriander spice we add to the boil. This beer is meant to be cloudy from the suspended yeast and proteins from the wheat malt. The fruit notes, phenolic spiciness of the yeast and tanginess of the wheat malt make this a refreshing yet complex beer.

e95f92fa-25c1-4a0c-8181-399817b51de7.name: There She Gose
e95f92fa-25c1-4a0c-8181-399817b51de7.description: Calamansi Lime Gose with Himalayan salt. Summer beach day in a glass.

ea331a49-f5cb-4686-bfb8-3ca4804275a7.name: HOP VIVANT IMPERIAL I.P.A.
ea331a49-f5cb-4686-bfb8-3ca4804275a7.description: Our award-winning American Imperial I.P.A. is medium-bodied and copper in color. It receives multiple dry-hop additions, which provide explosive aromas of pineapple, citrus, pine and a hint of resiny dankness. The malts provide a solid backbone and flavors of light caramel which complement the hop bitterness, flavor and aroma.

eb33b4d5-4fd9-42f7-a24f-71db787b198f.name: 2017 Father Christmas
eb33b4d5-4fd9-42f7-a24f-71db787b198f.style: Holiday Spiced Belgian Strong Dark Ale
eb33b4d5-4fd9-42f7-a24f-71db787b198f.description: When the weather starts to cool off in Florida – get ready for Father Christmas. Our spiced seasonal winter ale, it is a dark brown, rich ale that has a thick brown head and smells of mulling spices. The flavor is reminiscent of a Christmas cookie, with hints of clove, cinnamon, and ginger. This beer ages well and vintage releases are often available.

ee2d9de6-854d-4abe-b771-8f3015be107d.name: BLACKBERRY OR RASPBERRY WHEAT
ee2d9de6-854d-4abe-b771-8f3015be107d.description: This American Wheat beer is light, crisp and decidedly fruity from the addition of over 10# per barrel of either Blackberry or Raspberry Purée. Flaked Oats provide a soft texture while the citrus aromas from American hops mingle with the flavor of the Blackberries or Raspberries.

f27cca3f-2861-45c0-b859-728e45d091cc.name: Deadeye Stout
f27cca3f-2861-45c0-b859-728e45d091cc.description: Deadeye Stout – Dark and opaque, with a big roasty malty nose, a slight hint of coffee and notes of sweet toffee, all swaddled in ‘oaty’ creaminess, delivering the full-bodied mouth-feel you expect from a stout.			       5.5% ABV | 28 IBU’s

f6b1246b-f557-478f-9dc6-4d53944a1a6c.name: Batch 1000 (2017)
f6b1246b-f557-478f-9dc6-4d53944a1a6c.description:
This Belgian-style Quad was our 1000th batch of beer, aged for 13th months in a Sour Mash Buffalo Trace Barrel and then tapped on the occasion of our 6th Anniversary, September 16, 2017. A limited number of bombers and a limited amount of draft is available until it’s gone.

Look for the Batch 1000 (2018) varietal from a different barrel in 2018!

f71734f2-729c-4461-9b81-997b1685a543.name: Barn Phantom Gose with Rhubarb & Wild Strawberry
f71734f2-729c-4461-9b81-997b1685a543.description: (Experimental) Barn Phantom Gose with Wild Strawberry & Rhubarb –– Our Indiana Brewers Cup Gold Medal winning Gose has wild strawberry & rhubarb with a touch of lemon peel, coriander and pink Himalayan rock salt. Fruity and refreshing!

ff75bf67-6c95-4392-aa1c-bd9bc652d8d1.name: LB 4 LB
ff75bf67-6c95-4392-aa1c-bd9bc652d8d1.description: Collaboration with Long Beach Beer Lab and Laguna Beach Beer Company.
